content:
It's an issue in VScode editor on Gentoo Linux Workstation(remote access with VScode) where I check the Lean4 by creating test.lean in a new project named by Firstlemmaprover.

I create a test project named Firstlemmaprover with lake new Firstlemmaprover math then run lake exe cache get to download the required dependencies as the .. But the test.lean :=
"""import Mathlib.Topology.Basic
#check TopologicalSpace"""
had been reported "unknown package 'Mathlib'â€œ.

Then I tried to build the dependencies locally by lake update and then lake build but of course not worked.

The lake on My Gentoo is installed by shell curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leanprover/elan/master/elan-init.sh -sSf | sh. The same test.lean had been checked correctly in the existed project(folk) mathematics_in_lean as introduced in install documentation.

I have not reviewed the source code from scratch, Please give me some advice.

Thanks.
Please don't ask the same question multiple times in different threads. Let's discuss your problem here.
